description.value: Your muse is a virtuoso, inspiring you to greater heights. If itâ€™s a creature, it might be a performance-loving creature such as a choral angel or lillend azata; if a deity, it might be @Compendium[pf2e.deities.gxwmzxUWBOhdgFSN]{Shelyn}. As a bard with a maestro muse, you are an inspiration to your allies and confident of your musical and oratorical abilities. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sVjATEo8eqkAosNp]{Lingering Composition} feat and add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe} to your spell repertoire.
